comment: Not my favorite combination for this spirit. Big disappointment.2016
Smells like nuts and chocolate.no burn, smooth!
$10 pour @Barfly in Baltimore. Good and smooth on the tongue and equally smooth on the finish. Just a touch of chocolate sweetness on the finish
Disappointed. The nose has a fantastic chocolate sweetness with vanilla and honey. However the taste is harsh. Was expecting something rich and sweet, but it’s dry, astringent, herby, and peppery.
I really like this “flavored” whiskey. The infused dark chocolate is very subtle and doesn’t add any sweetness over what you would already find in your typical bourbon.
I liked this one. The chocolate is not sweet and subtle on the back end. A very good pour
love this with a heavey nose of chocolate, but doesn't find its way to the palate, interesting, not overly sweet.  great sipper, rare to find lately
Not the greatest of spirits,  the chocolate challenges and more sour then full:
